name: Sidelous
description:
:

This game was made in 3 days for Geo Jam, it's a puzzle game contains 15 Level, you have to pick color side that will face the ground by using stars, to interact with colored objects, and in the end enter the door that will send you to the next level .

CONTROL :

"r" : Restart

"m" : Open Menu

"Up Arrow" : Jump

"Right Arrow" : Move Right

"Left Arrow" : Move Right

"1" : Red Side Face Ground 

"2" : Blue Side Face Ground 

"3" : Yellow Side Face Ground 

"4" : Green Side Face Ground
